title: Gotta Catch 'Em ALL!
itunes:title: Gotta Catch 'Em ALL!
description:
WED 7/13 - Pokemon invade the studio as DJ Envy & Angela Yee hop on the #1 app craze while Charlamagne plays the Fun Police and gives all you wandering monster chasers a big HEE-HAW. Then it gets a little adult when people call in for "Ask Yee" and have different games in mind...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
